content.description: Throw out everything you think you know about ultralight touring boots, the Tecnica Zero G Peak Carbon Alpine Touring Ski Boots are here. Born from the minds of the same team who created the Zero G Tour Pro, the Zero G Peak boots break new ground in the sub-1000 gram class with a unique "interlocking" shell overlap and a lighter version of the dual-blocking walk mechanism that provides unprecedented downhill control. With carbon fiber reinforced Grilamid construction and a true carbon fiber cuff, a full ISO 9523 sole, and a wide 40mm cinching power strap the Zero G Peak is unrivalled for power transmission in this class and is set to blow the other 1 kilo boots out of the water.
content.name: Tecnica Zero G Peak Carbon Alpine Touring Ski Boots 2023
